Method Detail

costs

protected abstract double costs(double competence)
Returns the cost for solving a problem depending on the competence of the player. The higher the competence, the lower the cost.

Parameters:
competence - the competence of the player
Returns:
the cost incurred

value

protected abstract double value(double competence)
Returns the overall value an agent produces when solving a problem with a certain competence.

Parameters:
competence -
Returns:
the value produced

valueAdd

public double valueAdd(double competence)
Returns the surplus value (value - cost) an agent produces when solving a problem with a certain competence.

Parameters:
competence -
Returns:
the value added

price

protected abstract double price(double suppliersCompetence)
Returns the payment a customer has to give a supplier for solving the customer's problem.

The payment lies always between the costs for the solution and the value of the solution. HUME 2.0: payment should depend on the announced competence rather than the real competence of the supplier.

Parameters:
suppliersCompetence - the competence of the supplier (upon which the costs and the value depend)
Returns:
the payment

customersExploit

public double customersExploit(double suppliersCompetence)
Returns the payoff the customer receives if exploited, which is the negative of the customer's payment. HUME 2.0: customor's exploit payoff should depend on the announced competence rather than the real competence of the supplier.

Parameters:
suppliersCompetence - the competence of the supplier
Returns:
the customer's payoff

suppliersExploit

public double suppliersExploit(double suppliersCompetence)
Returns the payoff the supplier receives if the supplier exploits the customer. The payoff is then simply the payment of the customer. HUME 2.0: supplier's exploit payoff should depend on the announced competence rather than the real competence of the supplier.

Parameters:
suppliersCompetence - the competence of the supplier (on which the payoff depends)
Returns:
the cheating supplier's payoff

customersReward

public double customersReward(double suppliersCompetence)
Returns the reward the customer receives when the supplier proved to be trustworthy. The net reward is the value of the ssolution minus the payment HUME 2.0: the customer's "reward" shoould be a function of the invested competence and the announced competence of the supplier.

Parameters:
suppliersCompetence - the competence the supplier invests in solving the problem
Returns:
the customer's "reward"

suppliersReward

public double suppliersReward(double suppliersCompetence)
Returns the reward a trustworthy supplier keeps from the business. This is the payment minus the suppliers cost. HUME 2.0: the customer's "reward" shoould be a function of the invested competence and the announced competence of the supplier.

Parameters:
suppliersCompetence - the suppliers competence (upon which the cost and payment depend)
Returns:
the trustworthy supplier's "reward"
